attributes.name: variant
attributes.description: Define table variants. Initial variant will be decided by which variant is passed first. Variants are 'view' and 'edit'

attributes.name: columns
attributes.description: Name of primitive child attributes to display in header of item

attributes.name: templates
attributes.description: Attribute on parent (of same type as list) which should be used as template when instantiating new items. (e.g. 'template' will use the 'template' attribute on the parent.)

attributes.name: labelByIndex
attributes.description: Control whether index should be appended to label when table item is opened.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: Override label for all items that are opened in a ViewSelector from table.
